comments:
Steps:

1. create a CP (cpa2) in one plugin (LL_pluginA)
2. check in all files in library to CC
3. move the CP to another plugin (LL_pluginB),


it fails with the following errors,

An error has occurred. Click Details for more information.
  Error saving file(s)
    org.eclipse.epf.persistence.MultiFileIOException: Could not rename 'C:\CCRC_Views\ccrc_ple_RMC_v701_ifix1\tng_authoring\libraries\Beacon\plug-in B\capabilitypatterns\cpa2\model.xmi' to 'C:\CCRC_Views\ccrc_ple_RMC_v701_ifix1\tng_authoring\libraries\Beacon\my_plug-in\capabilitypatterns\cpa2\model.xmi'
	at org.eclipse.epf.persistence.MultiFileXMIResourceImpl.commit(MultiFileXMIResourceImpl.java:874)
	at org.eclipse.epf.persistence.MethodLibraryPersister$FailSafePersister.commit(MethodLibraryPersister.java:645)
	at org.eclipse.epf.persistence.MethodLibraryPersister$FailSafePersister.adjustLocation(MethodLibraryPersister.java:617)
	at org.eclipse.epf.library.edit.command.MethodElementAddCommand$MoveOperation.save(MethodElementAddCommand.java:1715)
	at org.eclipse.epf.library.edit.command.MethodElementAddCommand$MoveOperation.access$3(MethodElementAddCommand.java:1695)
	at org.eclipse.epf.library.edit.command.MethodElementAddCommand$4.run(MethodElementAddCommand.java:1480)
	at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run(ModalContext.java:113)

And cpa2 directory still exists in the original plugin (LL_pluginA)

This is actually not a regregression. This happened only if you tried to move a process from one plugin to another EMPTY plugin. This is caused by asking workspace to create a new folder without creating this new folder in local file system by calling IFolder.create(boolean force, boolean local, IProgressMonitor monitor) with local = false.
*** Bug 143083 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
closed it as verified by QA.
